text_block_list.name: Voice on the TV
text_block_list.text:
『――and this concludes this week's highlights from 
the Twinkle Series！ Man～ yet another set of noteworthy 
races to keep adding to the list！』
――『I still think it has to be you』
――『I still think it has to be you』

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
……so it's finally happened, huh？ 
Heh……guess I need to be careful what I say.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oops！ I need to get going.

Even though she rejected me when I scouted her, I couldn't get 
the sight of her running out of my head―― While thinking that, 
before I knew it I was back at that Soba stand.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oh！？ Well what do you know, if it ain't the trainer from before！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Yep. Hehehehe, but you're pretty lucky aren't ya！？ 
Today's the day they're holding a pretty big festival here.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
You're not gonna leave without seeing it, are ya！？ 
It's a festival ya know, would it not be better to make an appearance！？

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Waasshoi！ Waasshoi！！ C'mon, c'mon keep going！ 
Let's liven it up even more！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
You too, you should raise your voice too！ 
Waasshoi！ Waasshoi！！
(Pop pop pop！！)

text_block_list.name: Shopkeeper Old Man
text_block_list.text:
Kuwaa～ as expected of Inari-chan……！ Ya got meー！ 
Dang it, just take it ya little thiefー！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Ahahahahaha！ Howzzat, I got your revenge for ya！ 
Alright then, which stand should we hit up next！？

text_block_list.name: Shopkeeper Old Man
text_block_list.text:
Man, I didn't stand a chance against Inari-chan！ 
……Oh, that's right, that take-out place's kid 
is setting up a stand for the first time.

text_block_list.name: Shopkeeper Old Man
text_block_list.text:
Sounds like he got his hands on some good cucumbers for pickling, 
you should check it out later！ He'll probably be happy if 
Inari-chan shows up.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
You bet！ I was plannin' on that from the start. 
I'll buy 5, maybe 10, to start things off with a bang！

text_block_list.name: Shopkeeper Old Man
text_block_list.text: As expected of Inari-chan！ Yo, so classy！！

text_block_list.name: Purple Scrunchie Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Inari-neechaa～n！！ Over here, over here！！ 
Everyone on the team just finished gathering up too～！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Oh, is that right！？ Everyone on the team, 
that means…… ah, Chief！ Good to see you.

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text:
Oh, good work. ……Hm？ That person behind you…… 
that badge on their collar, are they perhaps……

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text:
Oh, good work. ……Hm？ That person behind you…… 
that badge on their collar, are they perhaps……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Haha, don't act so scared！ It's not like he'll bite 
your head off or somethin'. He's definitely got 
a scary face, but he's a nice guy, ya know！

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text:
Hey Inari, you always say one word too many. 
……Sorry about that. I'd heard you came all the way from 
Tracen Academy to see this girl here.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Hear that, Chief！？ You were able to train me up this much, 
doesn't it make ya proud！？

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
But, well, this is my hometown. Bein' on Chief's team and winnin' 
a bunch, I'll be creatin' huge waves here in Oi！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
You'll definitely come to the Oi racetrack 
to see my exploits, right？ Right！？

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: ……geez. You're so hopeless, aren't you？

With the end approaching the festival swung 
in to full gear, and we decided to retreat to 
the temple grounds to avoid the rowdiness.

With a sidelong glance, I watched as Inari One bit in to her 
grilled carrot, and I finished the last bit of my Ramune. ……Then, 
I broke the silence.
choice_data_list: You really love it here, don't you？
You really love it here, don't you？

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ! ……well, yeah, of course.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
The reason that I'm the way that I am―― a classy 
Edo kid thinking about her hometown, is probably 
because of everyone else in the town.
choice_data_list: The team has a good atmosphere too

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Right!? As I thought, you've got a good eye―― 
……hey, stop that.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: C'mon now, stop givin' me those sad puppy dog eyes. Geez……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Ya like my runnin' that much, do ya！？ In that case, just for you, 
how about I show ya my runnin' right now！？

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Eh……c'mon now, ya really wanna see it that badly！？ 
Geez, guys like you are just……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
……but, an Edo kid never goes back on their word. 
Guess there's no choice, follow me！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text:
Hmmmmm, right around here should be good. 
Alright, then――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Make sure ya get a good look！ ……There！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oraoraoraoraoraoraaaa！！

Even though it was just a gravel path, Inari One still ran with 
an unwavering strength. Even in the dark, her strong, strong 
running was a sight to behold――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa…… Huuuー！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: No problem！ Something like this is a piece of cake.
choice_data_list: As I thought, your run is the best！
As I thought, your run is the best！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (……Aaah, damnit. He's saying that with such honest eyes, this guy)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (What am I gonna do about this――)
